mapper.sql: vip.id, vip.customer_code, vip.card_type, vip.card_no, vip.mobile, vip.wechat, vip.cn_name, vip.sex, vip.brithday, vip.email, vip.origin_precent, vip.vip_time, vip.enable_price, vip.gift_price, vip.memo, vip.enabled, vip.updated_time, vip.created_name, vip.updated_name

where.if: and (vip.card_no like '%${q}%' or vip.mobile like '%${q}%' or vip.cn_name like '%${q}%' )

mapper.select: SELECT vip.id as id, vip.customer_code as customer_code, vip.card_type as card_type, vip.card_no as card_no, vip.mobile as mobile, vip.wechat as wechat, vip.cn_name as cn_name, vip.sex as sex, vip.brithday as brithday, vip.email as email, vip.origin_precent as origin_precent, vip.vip_time as vip_time, vip.enable_price as enable_price, vip.gift_price as gift_price, vip.memo as memo, vip.enabled as enabled, vip.updated_time as updated_time, vip.created_name as created_name, vip.updated_name as updated_name, customer.customer_type as customer_type, customer.customer_name as customer_name FROM bus_vip vip LEFT JOIN bus_customer customer on customer.customer_code = vip.customer_code
mapper.insert: insert into bus_vip (id, customer_code, card_type, card_no, mobile, wechat, cn_name, sex, brithday, email, origin_precent, vip_time, enable_price, gift_price, memo, enabled, updated_time, created_name, updated_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originPrecent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{vipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enablePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{giftPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update bus_vip
customer_code = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cn_name = #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brithday = #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
origin_precent = #{originPrecent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
vip_time = #{vipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enable_price = #{enablePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
gift_price = #{giftPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_name = #{createdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_name = #{updatedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bus_vip set customer_code = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cn_name = #{cnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brithday = #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin_precent = #{originPrecent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, vip_time = #{vipTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enable_price = #{enablePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gift_price = #{giftPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_name = #{createdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_name = #{updatedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
